description: This project revision has been prepared mainly to reflect additional US$7.0 million for 2008 from Department For International Development (DFID) and US$380,000 for 2009 from UNDP core funding. The project will contribute to two  CPAP Outputs, namely 1)

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacities for implementation of HIV funds and programmes, including those financed through multilateral initiatives like the Global Fund to fight AIDS, Tuberculosis, and Malaria
subproject.description: Continue supporting capacity development of the national HIV/AIDS entities particularly of National Centre of AIDS and STD Control and Logistics Management Division of Ministry of Health and Population in procurement and supply chain management.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Support National HIV/AIDS Prog

subproject.corporate outcome: Legislatures, regional elected bodies, and local assemblies have strengthened institutional capacity, enabling them to represent their constituents more effectively
subproject.description: Continue supporting capacity development of the national HIV/AIDS entities particularly of National Centre of AIDS and STD Control and Logistics Management Division of Ministry of Health and Population in procurement and supply chain management.

title: Support to National HIV/AIDS Programme
